entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
